text:
Dr, Burton Paulu
- 2 -
November 15, 1957
Tour references to “other communications" of mine is obscure. I believe I
know you too well to suppose you would exhibit the extremely poor taste to
use an NAEB letterhead and your office in the NAEB to refer” to non-NAEB
^^•r<ulCe® have had. In any case may I assure you that I am not aware
of any “communications" from which I should like to withdraw a single line.
Tour last paragraph pays tribute to the NAEB’s desire to serve all educational
broadcasters. I have heard much talk of this. Action, however, for £TV
stations, has been hard to get. I shall await with considerable interest
the action, or lack of it, of a Board which I now believe will (finally) con¬
sider some proposals to aid educational television.
Sincerely,
i . ...
John C. Schwarzwalder
General Manager
